member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text to be display as the message.

member.summary: Gets or sets the author to be display in the message.

member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time details when the message was created.

member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.AIMessage.Text

member.name: T:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.ArticleResponse
member.summary: Represents the response from AI. AI gets input from the user to write about, tone, format, length, and generates AI-generated content in markdown format.

member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.ArticleResponse.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the topic the user wants to write about.

member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.ArticleResponse.Tone
member.summary: Gets or sets the tone of the generated content. Examples: Professional, Casual, Enthusiastic, Informational, Funny, Succinct.

member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.ArticleResponse.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the generated content. Examples: Paragraph, Email, Bullet Points, LinkedIn Post, Summary, Report.

member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.ArticleResponse.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the generated content. Examples: Short, Medium, Long.

member.name: P:syncfusion.assistviewdemo.wpf.ViewModel.ArticleResponse.Article
member.summary: Gets or sets the Article content in markdown format.
